Title: Limits the amount of employer contributions to the state retirement system
Summary: Limits the amount of employer contributions to the state retirement system; authorizes an annual increase in employer contribution of the lesser of two percent or an inflation factor.
LawCode: Amd §§17 & 317, R & SS L; amd §521, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law and the education law, in relation to imposing a cap on the amount of contributions paid by employers
